section.title: Maintain Work Order Operations
section.para: To maintain work order operations, select the Maintain Work Order Operations option. The following screen will appear:
When maintaining work order operations, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the work order number of the work order whose operations you want to maintain.
Displays site code automatically when work order number is entered into Work Order # field.
Displays item number automatically when work order number is entered into Work Order # field.
Displays work order status automatically when work order number is entered into Work Order # field.
Indicates work order method is either assembly or disassembly.
Display lists operations associated with specified work order.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

tip.para: Use the edit feature to make temporary adjustments to the original operation found in the specified item's routing. Any changes made here are valid for the life of the work order only. The original bill of operations is not affected.

listitem.para: Moves an operation sequence up the work order operations list. Moving an operation up or down the work order operations list constitutes a production override. Changes made here do not affect the original routing sequence. Sequence numbers, which are incremented in multiples of ten, are automatically adjusted to reflect the change in position.

Moves an operation sequence down the work order operations list. Moving an operation up or down the work order operations list constitutes a production override. Changes made here do not affect the original routing sequence. Sequence numbers, which are incremented in multiples of ten, are automatically adjusted to reflect the change in position.
